transcript:
Har ghar tiranga abhiyan tirange ki shaan mein ek unique festival ban chuka hai.
Aur ek baar phir desh har ghar tiranga abhiyan ke saath aazadi ka utsav harshollas ke saath manane ja raha hai. 
To chaliye is 9 se 15 August hum sab har ghar tiranga abhiyan mein utsah aur umang ke saath jude aur is abhiyan mein hone wali tiranga yatraon, melon, rallyon aur marathon jaise karyakramon mein bhag le apne.
Hello.
Hello.
Haanji.
Namaste Manjit sir main Abhishek baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Kaise hain sir aap?
Sir aapki call aayi thi incoming call correct aapne ki hui thi.
Ji.
Ji ji isi prakar se ho gaya isliye main aapko call karna chahta hun kya issue aa raha hai.
Sir mere ko 10 minute ke baad call karo main nashta kar raha hun.
Achha theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a call after 10 minutes.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call after 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, follow up
